attributes.action: Scrap the PPP on London Underground
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Metronet goes into liquidation after using billions of taxpayers money it's now time to tell this government no more PPP.

The public were hoodwinked into believing PPP was funded by the companies involved like Metronet. The truth is more tax money is put into it than when London Underground was government funded. 
Ever get the feeling you're being had?
ENOUGH!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
